eu.cassandra.sim.utilities
Interface DBResults

All Known Implementing Classes:
DerbyResults, MongoResults
public interface DBResults

Interface defining the methods that database access classes should implement

Author:
Fani A. Tzima (fani [dot] tzima [at] iti [dot] gr)

Method Detail

createTablesAndIndexes

void createTablesAndIndexes()
Creates the tables/collections to be used for storing simulation output values and, possible, the indexes required to boost performance.

addKPIs

void addKPIs(java.lang.String inst_id,
             double maxPower,
             double avgPower,
             double energy,
             double cost,
             double co2)
Adds aggregate KPIs or KPIs for a specific installation.

Parameters:
inst_id - the installation id
maxPower - the maximum power
avgPower - the average power
energy - the energy
cost - the cost
co2 - the CO2 factor

addTickResultForInstallation

void addTickResultForInstallation(int tick,
                                  java.lang.String inst_id,
                                  double p,
                                  double q,
                                  java.lang.String tableName)
Adds a tick result for a specific installation.

Parameters:
tick - the tick
inst_id - the installation id
p - the active power value
q - the reactive power value
tableName - the name of the table/collection where the values are to be stored

addExpectedPowerTick

void addExpectedPowerTick(int tick,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          double p,
                          java.lang.String tableName)
Adds an aggregate expected power tick or a power tick for a specific installation or activity

Parameters:
tick - the tick
id - the installation/activity id
p - the expected power value
tableName - the name of the table/collection where the values are to be stored

addAggregatedTickResult

void addAggregatedTickResult(int tick,
                             double p,
                             double q,
                             java.lang.String tableName)
Adds an aggregated tick result.

Parameters:
tick - the tick
p - the active power value
q - the reactive power value
tableName - the name of the table/collection where the values are to be stored
